Method Summary
 void act()
          Call the hitreg function and set the transparancy to give an explosion effect
 void hitreg()
          If a midair explosion occurs where an a movable player(Player1 or Player2) is present, then remove that object and also remove the other non, moving player.

public void act()
Call the hitreg function and set the transparancy to give an explosion effect

Overrides:
act in class greenfoot.Actor

hitreg

public void hitreg()
If a midair explosion occurs where an a movable player(Player1 or Player2) is present, then remove that object and also remove the other non, moving player. If a midair explosion occurs near a stationary player(Player1_S or Player2_S, then remove that player and do nothing
